3:

Text: Battle of Clavijo:  The stories about the battle are first found centuries after it allegedly occurred; according to them, it was fought near Clavijo between Christians, led by Ramiro I of Asturias, and Muslims, led by the Emir of Córdoba.
Triplets:<Ramiro I of Asturias
5:
--------------------
Text: Battle of Clavijo:  He became the patron saint of Spain and is known to Spaniards as Saint James "Matamoros" ("the Moor-killer").
Triplets:<Saint James
7:
--------------------
<Text: Battle of Clavijo:  The date originally assigned to the battle, 834, was changed in modern times to 844 to suit the inherent contradictions of the account.>
Triplets:<Battle of Clavijo
8:
--------------------
<Text: Battle of Clavijo:  The day is sometimes given as 23 May.>
